meanings.definition: To give up something for a greater purpose.
meanings.sent1: She sacrificed her dessert to help her friend.
meanings.sent2: The soldier sacrificed his safety to protect his country.
meanings.sent3: The cat sacrificed its nap time to chase a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: The student sacrificed sleep to study for the exam.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter sacrificed his own comfort to save the family from the burning house.

meanings.sent1: The ancient tribe sacrificed animals to their gods.
meanings.sent2: The priest sacrificed a lamb during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The chef sacrificed a burnt dish to appease the kitchen gods.
meanings.sent4: The community sacrificed their time to volunteer at the shelter.
meanings.sent5: The family sacrificed their old belongings to make room for the new furniture.

meanings.definition: To suffer loss or harm for a greater good.
meanings.sent1: He sacrificed his job to stand up for his beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The activist sacrificed her freedom to fight for justice.
meanings.sent3: The superhero sacrificed his secret identity to save the city.
meanings.sent4: The athlete sacrificed his health to win the championship.
meanings.sent5: The parent sacrificed their own dreams for the sake of their children.
